author: Not available
source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry

text.0: Hwæt! Ic swefna cyst      secgan wylle,
text.3: þuhte me þæt ic gesawe      syllicre treow
text.5: beama beorhtost.      Eall þæt beacen wæs
text.7: fægere æt foldan sceatum,      swylce þær fife wæron
text.8: uppe on þam eaxlegespanne.      Beheoldon þær engel dryhtnes ealle,
text.9: fægere þurh forðgesceaft.      Ne wæs ðær huru fracodes gealga,
text.10: ac hine þær beheoldon      halige gastas,
text.11: men ofer moldan,      ond eall þeos mære gesceaft.
text.12: Syllic wæs se sigebeam,      ond ic synnum fah,
text.13: forwunded mid wommum.      Geseah ic wuldres treow,
text.17: Hwæðre ic þurh þæt gold      ongytan meahte
text.18: earmra ærgewin,      þæt hit ærest ongan
text.19: swætan on þa swiðran healfe.      Eall ic wæs mid sorgum gedrefed,
text.20: forht ic wæs for þære fægran gesyhðe.      Geseah ic þæt fuse beacen
text.21: wendan wædum ond bleom;      hwilum hit wæs mid wætan bestemed,
text.22: beswyled mid swates gange,      hwilum mid since gegyrwed.
text.23: Hwæðre ic þær licgende      lange hwile
text.25: oððæt ic gehyrde      þæt hit hleoðrode.
text.26: Ongan þa word sprecan      wudu selesta:
text.27: "þæt wæs geara iu,      (ic þæt gyta geman),
text.28: þæt ic wæs aheawen      holtes on ende,
text.29: astyred of stefne minum.      Genaman me ðær strange feondas,
text.30: geworhton him þær to wæfersyne,      heton me heora wergas hebban.
text.31: Bæron me ðær beornas on eaxlum,      oððæt hie me on beorg asetton,
text.32: gefæstnodon me þær feondas genoge.      Geseah ic þa frean mancynnes
text.33: efstan elne mycle      þæt he me wolde on gestigan.
text.34: þær ic þa ne dorste      ofer dryhtnes word
text.35: bugan oððe berstan,      þa ic bifian geseah
text.37: feondas gefyllan,      hwæðre ic fæste stod.
text.38: Ongyrede hine þa geong hæleð,      (þæt wæs god ælmihtig),
text.39: strang ond stiðmod.      Gestah he on gealgan heanne,
text.40: modig on manigra gesyhðe,      þa he wolde mancyn lysan.
text.41: Bifode ic þa me se beorn ymbclypte.      Ne dorste ic hwæðre bugan to eorðan,
text.42: feallan to foldan sceatum,      ac ic sceolde fæste standan.
text.43: Rod wæs ic aræred.      Ahof ic ricne cyning,
text.44: heofona hlaford,      hyldan me ne dorste.
text.45: þurhdrifan hi me mid deorcan næglum.      On me syndon þa dolg gesiene,
text.46: opene inwidhlemmas.      Ne dorste ic hira nænigum sceððan.
text.47: Bysmeredon hie unc butu ætgædere.      Eall ic wæs mid blode bestemed,
text.48: begoten of þæs guman sidan,      siððan he hæfde his gast onsended.
text.49: Feala ic on þam beorge      gebiden hæbbe
text.50: wraðra wyrda.      Geseah ic weruda god
text.54: wann under wolcnum.      Weop eal gesceaft,
text.55: cwiðdon cyninges fyll.      Crist wæs on rode.
text.57: to þam æðelinge.      Ic þæt eall beheold.
text.58: Sare ic wæs mid sorgum gedrefed,      hnag ic hwæðre þam secgum to handa,
text.59: eaðmod elne mycle.      Genamon hie þær ælmihtigne god,
text.60: ahofon hine of ðam hefian wite.      Forleton me þa hilderincas
text.61: standan steame bedrifenne;      eall ic wæs mid strælum forwundod.
text.62: Aledon hie ðær limwerigne,      gestodon him æt his lices heafdum,
text.63: beheoldon hie ðær heofenes dryhten,      ond he hine ðær hwile reste,
text.64: meðe æfter ðam miclan gewinne.      Ongunnon him þa moldern wyrcan
text.65: beornas on banan gesyhðe;      curfon hie ðæt of beorhtan stane,
text.66: gesetton hie ðæron sigora wealdend.      Ongunnon him þa sorhleoð galan
text.67: earme on þa æfentide,      þa hie woldon eft siðian,
text.68: meðe fram þam mæran þeodne.      Reste he ðær mæte weorode.
text.70: stodon on staðole,      syððan stefn up gewat
text.72: fæger feorgbold.      þa us man fyllan ongan
text.73: ealle to eorðan.      þæt wæs egeslic wyrd!
text.74: Bedealf us man on deopan seaþe.      Hwæðre me þær dryhtnes þegnas,
text.77: Nu ðu miht gehyran,      hæleð min se leofa,
text.78: þæt ic bealuwara weorc      gebiden hæbbe,
text.79: sarra sorga.      Is nu sæl cumen
text.80: þæt me weorðiað      wide ond side
text.81: menn ofer moldan,      ond eall þeos mære gesceaft,
text.82: gebiddaþ him to þyssum beacne.      On me bearn godes
text.83: þrowode hwile.      Forþan ic þrymfæst nu
text.84: hlifige under heofenum,      ond ic hælan mæg
text.85: æghwylcne anra,      þara þe him bið egesa to me.
text.86: Iu ic wæs geworden      wita heardost,
text.87: leodum laðost,      ærþan ic him lifes weg
text.89: Hwæt, me þa geweorðode      wuldres ealdor
text.91: Swylce swa he his modor eac,      Marian sylfe,
text.94: Nu ic þe hate,      hæleð min se leofa,
text.95: þæt ðu þas gesyhðe      secge mannum,
text.96: onwreoh wordum      þæt hit is wuldres beam,
text.97: se ðe ælmihtig god      on þrowode
text.100: Deað he þær byrigde,      hwæðere eft dryhten aras
text.101: mid his miclan mihte      mannum to helpe.
text.102: He ða on heofenas astag.      Hider eft fundaþ
text.105: ælmihtig god,      ond his englas mid,
text.106: þæt he þonne wile deman,      se ah domes geweald,
text.107: anra gehwylcum      swa he him ærur her
text.109: Ne mæg þær ænig      unforht wesan
text.110: for þam worde      þe se wealdend cwyð.
text.111: Frineð he for þære mænige      hwær se man sie,
text.112: se ðe for dryhtnes naman      deaðes wolde
text.113: biteres onbyrigan,      swa he ær on ðam beame dyde.
text.114: Ac hie þonne forhtiað,      ond fea þencaþ
text.115: hwæt hie to Criste      cweðan onginnen.
text.116: Ne þearf ðær þonne ænig      anforht wesan
text.117: þe him ær in breostum bereð      beacna selest,
text.118: ac ðurh ða rode sceal      rice gesecan
text.120: seo þe mid wealdende      wunian þenceð."
text.121: Gebæd ic me þa to þan beame      bliðe mode,
text.122: elne mycle,      þær ic ana wæs
text.124: afysed on forðwege,      feala ealra gebad
text.125: langunghwila.      Is me nu lifes hyht
text.126: þæt ic þone sigebeam      secan mote
text.128: well weorþian.      Me is willa to ðam
text.129: mycel on mode,      ond min mundbyrd is
text.130: geriht to þære rode.      Nah ic ricra feala
text.131: freonda on foldan,      ac hie forð heonon
text.132: gewiton of worulde dreamum,      sohton him wuldres cyning,
text.133: lifiaþ nu on heofenum      mid heahfædere,
text.134: wuniaþ on wuldre,      ond ic wene me
text.135: daga gehwylce      hwænne me dryhtnes rod,
text.136: þe ic her on eorðan      ær sceawode,
text.138: ond me þonne gebringe      þær is blis mycel,
text.139: dream on heofonum,      þær is dryhtnes folc
text.140: geseted to symle,      þær is singal blis,
text.141: ond me þonne asette      þær ic syþþan mot
text.142: wunian on wuldre,      well mid þam halgum
text.143: dreames brucan.      Si me dryhten freond,
text.144: se ðe her on eorþan      ær þrowode
text.145: on þam gealgtreowe      for guman synnum.
text.146: He us onlysde      ond us lif forgeaf,
text.148: mid bledum ond mid blisse      þam þe þær bryne þolodan.
text.149: Se sunu wæs sigorfæst      on þam siðfate,
text.150: mihtig ond spedig,      þa he mid manigeo com,
text.153: ond eallum ðam halgum      þam þe on heofonum ær
text.154: wunedon on wuldre,      þa heora wealdend cwom,
text.155: ælmihtig god,      þær his eðel wæs.
